alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dauphin; Montour; Northumberland; Perry; Schuylkill; Snyder (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Columbia, Dauphin, Montour, Northumberland, Perry, Schuylkill and Snyder. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomsburg, Shamokin, Mount Carmel, Kulpmont, Millersburg, Elysburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Trevorton, Lykens, Catawissa, Elizabethville, Marshallton, Port Trevorton, Lavelle, Fernville, Aristes, Numidia, Wilburton Number One, Rupert and Locustdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dauphin; Montour; Northumberland; Perry; Schuylkill; Snyder
